H0.text: Who was the King of Troy during the famous siege. Agamemnon

H1.text: Who was the King of Troy during the famous siege. Hector

H2.text: Who was the King of Troy during the famous siege. Odysseus

H3.text: Who was the King of Troy during the famous siege. Priam

A4.text: In Greek mythology, Priam (; Ancient Greek: Πρίαμος, pronounced [prí.amos]) was the legendary and last king of Troy during the Trojan War.

A5.text: Priam was killed when he was around 80 years old by Achilles' son Neoptolemus.
